p: Protein sequence alignment of DEN-80E of DENV1, DENV2, DENV3, and DENV4 was generated and displayed using ClustalW2 and ESPript 3.x [ 86, 87]. The NCBI accession numbers are ACJ04226 (DENV1), AGS49173 (DENV2), AJA37731 (DENV3) and ACW82884 (DENV4), respectively. The E protein model and the amino acid representation of the epitopes were displayed using UCSF chimera ( http://www.rbvi.ucsf.edu/chimera). The protein data bank (PDB) accession numbers of the dengue envelope protein are 1UZG [ 88], 3G7T [ 89], 1OK8 [ 25], 3UC0 [ 50], 3C6E [ 24], 3J27 [ 67].
